summary: To set a health plan adherence goal of 75% for August to build on the stability achieved after recent travel.
trigger: The need to maintain post-travel stability and build a better toolkit for managing health metrics.
rationale: Data indicated that travel causes significant spikes in Rohan's BP and disrupts his sleep.
Rohan's adherence post-travel has been strong, leading to a good response in his health metrics.
Dr. Warren proposed the 75% adherence goal specifically to maintain this stability.
Rohan confirmed he has no travel planned for August, making it a suitable month for focusing on this goal.
